SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.CLNT101_ADMNO, A.CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT A join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = :2 join :1/CLNT B on B.CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and B.CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO where :3 order by A.CLNT101_ADMNO, A.CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,8}='LIMIT','A.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = B.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO and A.CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = B.CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO','A.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = B.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and A.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = B.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH_NO from :1/DEBH where :2 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null order by DEBH_NO for fetch only
select DEBH_NO from :1/DEBH where :2 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null order by DEBH_NO for fetch only
